医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究强调社区老年人的抑郁趋势哥伦比亚大学梅尔曼公共卫生学院的一项研究报告称，在美国社区居住的老年人的多地点样本中发现抑郁症患病率存在​​显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Research-highlights-depression-trends-in-community-dwelling-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Research-highlights-depression-trends-in-community-dwelling-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54abbed9-c246-4913-bc46-d31d3a624371 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 13:14:19 -0500 Research highlights depression trends in community-dwelling older adults
血液测试可以帮助追踪阿尔茨海默病的进展和严重程度体内自然发生的两种分子的血液水平下降与阿尔茨海默病的恶化密切相关，尤其是在女性中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Blood-test-could-help-track-Alzheimers-disease-progression-and-severity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Blood-test-could-help-track-Alzheimers-disease-progression-and-severity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b2ae97f-2c85-41f7-96a8-25cf84d3f232 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 13:09:16 -0500 Blood test could help track Alzheimer's disease progression and severity
棕色脂肪组织可以提高运动表现和寿命一项新的研究观点发表在 Aging 杂志（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”，Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 16 卷，第 22 期，2024 年 12 月 18 日，题为“Brown adipose Organization Improves”锻炼表现和健康长寿。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Brown-adipose-tissue-could-enhance-exercise-performance-and-longevity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Brown-adipose-tissue-could-enhance-exercise-performance-and-longevity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1e3bb04-2687-45ce-8d67-625b96ad095f Wed, 08 Jan 2025 13:03:07 -0500 Brown adipose tissue could enhance exercise performance and longevity
共同努力为孕妇和儿童提供更好的营养怀孕期间营养不良会对孕产妇和儿童健康造成严重后果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Collaborative-effort-targets-better-nutrition-for-pregnant-women-and-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Collaborative-effort-targets-better-nutrition-for-pregnant-women-and-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a4c42a3-f196-4ff6-87f2-978eb304ea99 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 13:00:00 -0500 Collaborative effort targets better nutrition for pregnant women and children
新研究确定了帮助人们戒烟的有效策略由马萨诸塞大学阿默斯特分校研究人员共同领导的一项新研究旨在确定帮助人们戒烟的最有效策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/New-study-identizes- effective-strategies-to-help-people-quit-vaping.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/New-study-identizes- effective-strategies-to-help-people-quit-vaping.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=748cd440-dbcb-494f-bafd-1570b38d414c Wed, 08 Jan 2025 12:55:11 -0500 New study identifies effective strategies to help people quit vaping
接骨木浆果汁改善代谢健康和体重管理根据华盛顿州立大学最近领导的一项研究，接骨木浆果汁可能是控制体重和增强代谢健康的有效工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Elderberry-juice-improves-metabolic-health-and-weight-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Elderberry-juice-improves-metabolic-health-and-weight-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2020af8b-4111-4e00-bf0b-530b7c2dfc48 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 12:40:23 -0500 Elderberry juice improves metabolic health and weight management
飞机噪音高会增加心脏病和中风的风险伦敦大学学院 (UCL) 领导的一项新研究表明，居住在机场附近并暴露于高飞机噪音水平的人可能面临更大的心脏功能不良风险，从而增加心脏病发作、危及生命的心律失常和中风的可能性。伦敦）研究人员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/High-aircraft-noise-increases-risk-of-heart-problems-and-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/High-aircraft-noise-increases-risk-of-heart-problems-and-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=932a9689-49f5-45b5-8121-e7e36cb9bfbf Wed, 08 Jan 2025 12:32:18 -0500 High aircraft noise increases risk of heart problems and stroke
极端天气影响艾滋病毒预防和治疗的可及性根据本月早些时候《传染病当前观点》发表的一篇评论，由于气候变化，艾滋病毒预防和护理方面出现了新的挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Extreme-weather-impacts-HIV-prevention-and-treatment-access.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Extreme-weather-impacts-HIV-prevention-and-treatment-access.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=857b8d40-dab5-424c-9951-0444c0d59445 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 12:25:36 -0500 Extreme weather impacts HIV prevention and treatment access
AI 分析揭示 IVF 成功的最佳卵泡大小在体外受精治疗期间，医生使用超声波扫描来监测卵泡（卵巢中含有卵子的小囊）的大小，以决定何时进行激素注射（称为“触发”），以准备收集卵子并确保它们准备好与精子受精以产生胚胎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/AI-analysis-reveals-optimal-follicle-sizes-for-IVF-success.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/AI-analysis-reveals-optimal-follicle-sizes-for-IVF-success.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=008bd5ca-c96f-4c6f-8ee5-57e4a037d78f Wed, 08 Jan 2025 12:16:43 -0500 AI analysis reveals optimal follicle sizes for IVF success
都柏林大学研究人员发现与斑马鱼视力问题有关的基因突变都柏林大学学院 (UCD) 的研究人员发现，一种名为 emc1 的基因突变会导致斑马鱼出现严重的视力问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/UCD-researchers-discover-gene-mutation-linked-to-vision-problems-in-zebrafish.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/UCD-researchers-discover-gene-mutation-linked-to-vision-problems-in-zebrafish.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2bd9d386-7766-4d48-8238-76ddac6c87e3 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 12:09:49 -0500 UCD researchers discover gene mutation linked to vision problems in zebrafish
